End of Hope.text: End of Primordial Round: Perform Signature.

Vanish X.text: Move the Primordial X spaces towards the closest Board Edge, without turning, ignoring Board Edges directly across from the Target or attacking Titan. If thes would move the Primordial beyond a Board Edge or outside of all ranges of light, it disappears. When the Primordial is outside the Battle Board, it cannot be affected in any way.

Pale Grin of Doom.text: When you are attacked from behind, ignore the Evasion Roll; the Attack automatically hits with all the dice.

Fear is Constant.text: Start of Battle: Chosen Titan gains the Fear Condition card, another Titan gains the Terror Condition card, a third one flips 1 Oxygen token.

Blacker Than The Night.text: When the Primordial performs Vanish X, it doesn't ignore the Board Edges directly across from the Target or attacking Titan.

Pale Grin of Death.text: When you are attacked from behind, ignore the Evasion Roll. You are immediately devoured (dead).

Light is Dimming.text: If you don't have any Light X keyword, you are always considered to be attacked from behind.

Psychosomatic Poisoning.text: When you gain a Condition card, and each time you start your turn with a Condition card, gain 1 Ambrosia token.

Relentless Anxiety.text: When the Primordial vanishes, immediately draw an AI card.

Deeper Depths.text: Each Titan starts the Battle with 1 Oxygen token less.

Original Trench.text: Normal (not Terrain) Battle Board spaces are considered Terrain tiles with the Chasm keyword. All other Terrain is considered Elevated.

Beginning of the End.text: End of Primordial Round: Before End of Hope, draw and perform another AI card.

Dragon of the Lightless Void.text: You can only use X amount of Opening or Closing tokens from the Kratos Pool. You can only use X amount of Break, Fire, Black, and Hope tokens from the Kratos Pool combined. X is equal to your Light X keyword.

Ruthless.text: Remove all positive Trauma cards from the Trauma decks (except Obols).

Heat Death.text: Primordial doesn't destroy Petrified Vent Terrain tiles it moves through. Primordial's Crash causes incineration.

Microwave Shield.text: Before performing an Attack Roll, for each space between you and the Primordial, discard 1 token from the Kratos Pool.

Truth or Death.text: Before performing a Scan, declare if the Primordial is there. If you are not correct, after resolving the Scan, draw an Obol.

Invisible Flame.text: When you climb the VP, and when you start your turn on the VP, gain 1 Ambrosia token and 1 Pain token.

Nap of the Vent.text: Primordial destroys Petrified Vent Terrain tiles it moves through.

Tigerback.text: To leave the VP voluntarily, you need to pass a Climb Down test (same difficulty as the Climb test).

Candle in the Dark.text: If your Light X is lower than the Primordial level divided by 2 (rounding up), Skitter loses WoOIcon.

Black Soup.text: If you fail to find the Primordial during the Titan Round, every Titan dies.
